Good Afternoon,
Happy Friday! My name is Erika Stamper with the Chevron and Texaco Business Card Program. I'm going to be in the Phoenix area the week of October 2nd and I'd like to know if you have a few minutes available to discuss our programs along with the benefits and savings we offer?

Please let me know which day and time works best. :)
Kind Regards,
Erika
Erika Stamper Commercial Fleet Specialist Chevron and Texaco Business Card Program Phone - (657) 258-4167 Fax - (207) 761-3589 www.chevrontexacobusinesscard.com
